name: BadWeather
0:
”Alexa, open bad weather”
”i would like some bad weather”
”what is the forecast”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bad weather
des:
The Bad Weather skill gives you what some may call, 'alternative facts' about the weather. Give it a shot. Maybe Alexa will get it right? 

(.. don't hold your breath.)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
